trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"></xref> control types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 公开<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"></xref>控制类型传递给[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentAutomationPeer represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: DocumentAutomationPeer 表示文档和支持<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 对象如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>可以包含嵌入的对象，如图像和超链接。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: 最初，当你尝试获取子元素的文档，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>不返回嵌入的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取嵌入的元素，获取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>从<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>并调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 之后<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用时，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>返回受<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>中的任何元素</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 除非你知道文档是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>，不应调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: 如果从网络位置加载该文档，调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>对整个文档是资源密集型。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应在使用的方法之一<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>返回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>，它表示文档的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此关联控件的控件类型<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>调用此方法

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，它表示与此关联的元素的屏幕坐标<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>调用此方法

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绑定矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取子元素的集合<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>调用此方法

trans-unit.source: Because <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> gives access to its content through <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"></xref>, this method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>访问通过其内容的<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"> </xref>，此方法始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的名称<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>调用此方法

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Document".
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含"文档"。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> ，表示位于的可点击空间<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>调用此方法

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: 表示位于元素上的可点击空间的点。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的控件模式<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .
trans-unit.target: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>理解为交互式的最终用户或用户可能了解<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>中的控件的逻辑结构组成[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>调用此方法

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>是否不在屏幕。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>调用此方法

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不指示元素是否可见。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，元素将显示在屏幕上，但却仍不可见。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果元素被遮盖其他元素，则它可能不可见。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，该方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该元素不在屏幕上。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
